fileLabel:
Label part of the filename. {objectName} is replace by the name of the object, region, or by the id of th subdivision. {platform} is replaced by 'Terra'. {thisDate} is replaced by the formatted date for the records within the file, being day, or month; NB: gap files contain 3 months, but the filename only contain the middle month; the stat files aggregate all the stats per subdivision and the filename doesn't have a date. {version} is replaced by v006, although the version of the modis data is v6.1.
NB: Don't use the text '65535' (max('uint16')) or '*' in filenames or name of subfolders.
fileSubDirectory3: For data directories, this may be used to indicate the version of collection: {versionOfDataCollection}
fileSubDirectory4: For some labels, there are a lot of objects (e.g. regional stats for subdivisions). The fileSubDirectory3 allow to spread them in subfolders. When used, {objectName_1000} is replaced by the id of the subdivision / 1000, floored.
objectDependent: 1: the file depends on an object, region, tile, or subdivision.
dateDependent: 1: the file depends on a date, this is typical of data files, except for subdivision regional stats
dimensionInfo: 11: 1 dim row: row*column (reshaped matrix with on row with each pixel correspond to a column). 20: 2 dim: pixel row x column (only one day here). 21: 2 dim: pixel day x row*column (reshaped matrix with each pixel corresponding to a column of days), 30: pixel row x column x day.
period: 1: 1 day only. It can be a specific day or 1 representative day with an average of data. 2: 1 month. It contains a varying number of days, 28, 29, 30, 31. 3: 3 months. It contains a varying number of days, up to 92. 4: 1 calendar year, from Jan 1st to Dec 31, contains 365 or 366 days. 5: 1 waterYear, for northern hemisphere, from 10/1 to 9/30, for southern hemisphere, from 4/1 to 3/31 or others, contains 365 or 366 days.
countOfFilesPerDim1: 1. for most. But if we have one file per cell (way of split a raster in squares), here is the total of cells on the row dimension (dim 1), the total of files is countOfFilesPerDim1 * countOfFilesPerDim2
countOfFilesPerDim2: 1. for most. But if we have one file per cell (way of split a raster in squares), here is the total of cells on the column dimension (dim 2)
dateFieldType: NB: Mix of type and format, but we don’t know if yyyyMMdd is char or int…
fieldForVarNameWithinFile: Field in configuration_of_variables.csv that indicates the variable name which is within the file (may be different than the variable name in the filepath).
webRelativeFilePath: FilePath in the nusnow ingest platform to put the files for ingestion by snow-today website.
webRelativeFilePathInJson: Relative filepath indicated in the .json file, that will be used by the snow-today web-app.
isAncillary:
1: is ancillary data only handling of versionOfAncillary. 2. is ancillary data but no handling of versionOfAncillary. 0: is nrt/historic data, only handling of the version indicated in modisData.versionOf.(dataLabel)
[WARNING]: this value should be the same for all versions of the dataLabel.
root: Root directory where the file is. 1: archive or scratch. 2: daac.

comment: lookup table having values for albedo precalculated
derived from Ned 202311 Topography.h5 files. Clockwise 0-360 from North.
derived from Ned 202311 Topography.h5 files
1 file per subdivision. ObjectName is the subdivisionId
1 file per root subdivision, which flatly list all the descendant subdivisions . ObjectName is the id of the root subdivision.
1 file per root subdivision, which presents the hierarchy of the descendant subdivisions . ObjectName is the id of the root subdivision.
Just for visualization of the hierarchy, no use in the app.
1 file only. No difference between versions
1 file only. No difference between versions because the file should contain ALL root subdivisions (westernUS, Alaska, AMAndes, etc)
lookup table having values for darkening and radiative forcing precalculated
derived from Ned 202311 Topography.h5 files
Same as water (for spires, because for v3,1, we use files given by Ned).
1 file to create in web-app to launch web-app ingest. No file in our backend
Stored in github
Temporary flag file to indicate that the slurm job has been manually required for cancellation.
Temporary file after interpolation by pixel to avoid multiprocess access to write the same file.
Label should have been modisspiresfillbycell
JD: julian day number
JD: julian day number
JD: julian day number
V3.1 file contains varName, v3.2 file contains varNameWithinFile because geotiff generated from netcdf where varName different from varNameWithinFile
Kept for compatibility with the v2023.1 web-app. To remove when v2024 website launched

Rather than year, its waterYear which is used here.
